strings.Value: "I take it this is yours?"
"So you've finally decided to show me your favorite piece of underwear?"
"Take this trash away from me!"
"What's it doing here?"
"Well, get rid of this excuse of a codpiece."
"Good for you, you got your cap back."
"What do you mean, challenge?"
"The King has returned? Why would he humiliate himself?"
"Then we need to stop him."
"Then you need to stop him."
"If you can lead me to him, I'll go with you – but the fight must be yours."
"I don't have time for goblin politics. This is your mess, you deal with it."
"You wanted to be a Big Hero, so this is it. Go, prove yourself."
"All right, I'll help you, but we have to be quick."
"That's... not ominous."
"An enchantment? This may be Nyrissa's work."
"Did your tribe ever deal with demons?"
{n}Nok-Nok seems confused. You notice what seems to be a leather rag in his hands. It smells faintly of... sulfur.{/n}

{n}Nok-Nok remains frozen as he stares at the cap in hands – he seems surprised and uneasy.{/n} "Was once mine, wore in the village. {d|GoblinKing}King{/d} once rip it off my head, beat me across skull and face with it... then use as wiperag, and hit me again. Thought was lost, long ago."
{n}A series of light chuckles travel across the room. The startled goblin, however, doesn't react to your joke.{/n}

{n}Nok-Nok looks uneasy.{/n} "It's a challenge, for ruler of tribe. The King... has come back for me. But... cap look strange, smell strange. Why now?" {n}He glances around.{/n} "Where it come from? Goblin come here, drop it off?"

{n}Nok-Nok takes a deep breath.{/n} "When goblins in Steal Lands fight for tribes, they fight over big, best hat. Hat like crown, but not ugly and shiny like yours – this is a challenge, another tribe."

{n}He swallows.{/n} "Maybe he hear of our allying. Think he can get back crown by fighting me." {n}Nok-Nok looks confused – well, more so than usual – and one of his ears begins to twitch.{/n} "But how he get power back?" {n}He finally shrugs.{/n} "If in kingdom now, probably cause a lot of trouble."
{n}Nok-Nok shakes head, worried.{/n} "Not sure can do on own. If he back, he's ready for me."

{n}Nok-Nok nods, then leans down, then with a shaking finger, turns the cap over... on the inside, you see a map scrawled in red.{/n} "He show us the way... we meet him where {g|Lamashtu}Lamashtu{/g} Shrines are. We need to come together, you and me. Rules of challenge."
{n}As you glance at the map, you both are surprised as the leather cap suddenly alights, burning brightly... then crumbles to ash on the floor.{/n}
{n}Nok-Nok's face collapses as he leaves you. You slightly wonder if he will actually take up this challenge at all.{/n}

{n}Nok-Nok nods, then leans down, then with a shaking finger, turns the cap over... on the inside, you see a map scrawled in red.{/n} "He show us the way... we meet him where {g|Lamashtu}Lamashtu{/g} Shrines were. We need to come together, you and me. Rules of challenge."
{n}Nok-Nok is silent, staring at the ash – he says nothing. You've never seen him this worried. You decide to give him space, but keep the challenge in the back of your mind.{/n}
